contents.name: ConfigurationCode
contents.description: provides the specific information how the machine vision system has been configured for a specific use case or application

contents.name: ConfigurationCode
contents.description: provides the specific information how the machine vision system has been configured for a specific use case or application

contents.name: DeviceHealth
contents.description: indicates the status as defined by NAMUR Recommendation NE107. The DeviceHealthEnumeration DataType is formally defined in OPC 10000-100 Device Model

contents.name: RemainingLifeTime
contents.description: denotes the remaining lifetime of the item. It serves as an indication to service personnel for maintenance activities

contents.name: State
contents.description: denotes the SEMI E10 State of the item

contents.name: Temperature
contents.description: denotes the temperature value (along with its unit) of the item

contents.name: DeviceHealthAlarms
contents.description: folder to organize the Alarms and Conditions related to the item if these Alarms and Conditions are instantiated in the address space

contents.name: CalibrationNeeded
contents.description: a flag that if True denotes that the item needs calibration

contents.name: FirmwareInfo
contents.description: denotes the information about the firmware of the Item

contents.name: LastCalibration
contents.description: denotes the time when the previous calibration was carried out on the item

contents.name: LastService
contents.description: denotes the last moment in time when the most recent service was carried out on the item

contents.name: MaintenanceRecord
contents.description: provides the most recent note that was recorded while performing maintenance. This property can be historized if a history of previous maintenance notes is to be made available

contents.name: NextCalibration
contents.description: denotes the planned time when the next calibration is to be carried out on the item.

contents.name: NextService
contents.description: denotes the planned moment in time when the next service is to be carried out on the item

contents.name: StartOfWarranty
contents.description: denotes the beginning of the warranty period of the item

contents.name: ServiceClass
contents.description: provides information that an item is classified as a wear and tear part, whether it is a line replaceable unit (LRU), shop replaceable unit (SRU), wear and tear part (WTP), infrastructural unit (ISU), infrastructural equipment (ISE), etc
